import React from 'react'; import '../styles/newProductForm.css'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {v4} from 'uuid'; //new code function NewProductForm(props) { // Function for handling onsubmission event function handleNewProductFormSubmission(event){ event.preventDefault(); // console.log(event.target.name.value) // console.log(event.target.price.value) // console.log(event.target.description.value) // console.log(event.target.quantity.value); props.onNewProductCreation({ name: event.target.name.value, price: event.target.price.value, description: event.target.description.value, quantity: event.target.quantity.value, id: v4() }) } return (
